content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Service Anniversary Program \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rEmployees with a milestone anniversary (5, 10, 15, or 20 years with EPAM) receive a congratulatory notification that they have been awarded e-points based on their level of tenure in the Awardco system. E-points can be spent at the employeeâ€™s discretion on items in the Awardco catalog or saved for later use.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":82891,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ade7093b-785d-458e-851e-43f0cb02fdad/thank you 4.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ade7093b-785d-458e-851e-43f0cb02fdad/thank you 4.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"thank you 4.png\",\"name\":\"thank you 4.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ade7093b-785d-458e-851e-43f0cb02fdad\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":576,\"height\":397},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
